tasks.title: Implement Test Coverage for Multi-Agent System
tasks.description: Create comprehensive test coverage for all agents in the dhafnck_mcp system to reach 80% overall coverage target. This epic encompasses testing for coding agents, testing agents, documentation agents, and orchestration agents.
tasks.details: Starting implementation of comprehensive test coverage for multi-agent system. This epic requires achieving 80% overall coverage across coding agents, testing agents, documentation agents, and orchestration agents. Current overall progress: 22.2% (2/9 tasks completed)."

tasks.title: Test Coverage for Coding Agent Components
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive tests for coding agent functionality including code generation, refactoring, and quality analysis. Target: 85% coverage for coding-related modules.

tasks.title: Test Coverage for Testing Agent Infrastructure
tasks.description: Create meta-tests for testing agents including functional tester, performance tester, and test orchestrator. Ensure testing framework reliability and coverage accuracy.

tasks.title: Test Coverage for Documentation Agent System
tasks.description: Implement tests for documentation generation, validation, and maintenance processes. Test automated documentation updates and multi-format output generation.

tasks.title: Test Coverage for DevOps Agent Operations
tasks.description: Create comprehensive tests for CI/CD pipeline operations, infrastructure provisioning, monitoring setup, and deployment automation handled by DevOps agents.

tasks.title: Test Coverage for System Architecture Agent Logic
tasks.description: Implement tests for system design validation, architecture compliance checking, and design pattern enforcement mechanisms used by system architect agents.

tasks.title: Test Coverage for Task Management Agent Coordination
tasks.description: Create comprehensive tests for task planning, orchestration, and multi-agent coordination features. Test task dependencies, priority management, and workflow automation.

subtasks.title: Test Task Creation and Validation Logic
subtasks.description: Unit tests for task creation with various input scenarios, validation rules, and error handling

subtasks.title: Test Multi-Agent Orchestration Workflows
subtasks.description: Integration tests for agent switching, context synchronization, and workflow coordination

subtasks.title: Test Dependency Management and Resolution
subtasks.description: Tests for task dependency creation, resolution, cycle detection, and critical path calculation

tasks.title: Create Comprehensive Test Plan for Multi-Agent Coverage
tasks.description: Develop a detailed test plan outlining coverage targets, testing strategies, and coordination between different agent testing efforts. Include timeline, resources, and success criteria.

tasks.title: Implement Test Coverage Monitoring and Reporting
tasks.description: Set up automated test coverage monitoring, reporting dashboards, and CI/CD integration for continuous coverage tracking across all agent components.
